questions.quote: Where are you up to, with such a nice present, birthday party?
Come on, I'm tellin' you, it's great. I opened up all the windows... the air is cold, the tub is boiling hot... It's like Sweden, man. Sweeeeden!
I hope you think about what you've done here today. And if you want to call and apologize, you know where to reach me.
I told you not to say anything. You can't go in there, brazenly flaunt the rules and then think I'm gonna share with you!
And she didn't say something to you about a certain something?
I *love* the Drake! I'm looking forward to meeting the Drakette!
It was your family that pushed you into banking , it was their dream for you...
Listen. I need you to do me a favor. When's the next time you're gonna see him?
Yeah, let me ask you a question. How do you cross those wires?
That woman is such an idiot! I was gonna do this whole bit on that bottle - and now I got nothing to talk about.
